Text: Re U of H gradsI did not graduate from U of H I would be happy to assist you with any recruiting efforts Forwarded by Gretchen JenningsOTSEnron on AM Laura Wilkinson AM To Gretchen nron cc Subject Re U of H grads Gretchen I am sure Rod will need your help with this college recruiting effort even if you did not go to that school just kidding Forwarded by Laura WilkinsonOTSEnron on AM Rod Hayslett AM To Dave NRON cc Kristin nron Laura nron Estalee NRON Subject Re U of H grads Thanks I will be contacting them over the next few weeks while we are starting to set up next years program Dave Schafer PM To Rod NRON cc Kristin nron Laura nron Estalee NRON Subject U of H grads Rod Per your request this morning it turns out you cant swing a dead cougar around here in GPG HR without hitting a U of H grad Kristin Passmore an HR Assistant whom you may not have met yet as well as Estalee and Laura all are University of Houston graduates in good standing Well Laura barely is in good standing but Ill let her be the one to tell you all about that In addition Miranda Southard a student learner in our department will be a senior this Fall at U of H Each of these good people has expressed an interest in helping you with any recruiting efforts directed at U of H alumni ds

Reare the ratings per your request Let me know if you need anything else NAME MIDYEAR RATING BORCYK DAVID EXCELLENT BRASHER BARNEY EXCELLENT BRASSFIELD MORRIS EXCELLENT CENTILLI JAMES SATISFACTORY CHANDLER ROBERT STRONG CHERRY PAUL STRONG CLEMENTS DAVID STRONG COBB JOHN EXCELLENT CONCKLIN ELAINE SATISFACTORY FENSTAD LARRY NEEDS IMPROVEMENT GEACCONE TRACY STRONG JESSE JOHN EXCELLENT KEISER JOHN STRONG KONSDORF ELLEN SATISFACTORY PETERS JERRY STRONG QUITTNER GEORGE NEEDS IMPROVEMENT ROPER KERWIN EXCELLENT SAUNDERS JAMES STRONG STERN ELLIS STRONG WIEDERHOLT PATRICIA STRONG Rod Hayslett AM To Gretchen nron cc Subject Can you please provide me with a list of people for this purpose All directors and above with mid year rating Forwarded by Rod HayslettFGTEnron on AM Rod Hayslett AM To Kerry NRON James NRON Jerry NRON cc Kathy NRON Subject To ensure that all accounting employees Directors and above are ranked in the Global Accounting PRC meeting on friday December st I am asking your assistance in confirming the names and titles of these employees Please send me a list of the names and job titles of your employees on the payroll as of October An example is indicated below This information should be in the following format and also include the cluster descriptor for midyear as well as the recommendation for year end I have attached a copy of the cluster descriptors for your reference and would like this information by Wednesday November th If you are unable to provide the information by this date please let me know as soon as possible If you have any questions please do not hesitate to call me at Your cooperation is greatly appreciated Thank you EXAMPLE NAME JOB TITLE CLUSTER DESCRIPTOR Jane Dawson Associate Superior July Summer Finance Mgr Needs Improvement August Carson Director Finance Excellent

Year End Operations Administration Meetingmeeting will be held on starting at AM in ACC In order to ensure the meeting moves quickly please provide a prerating to me for each of your employees I need these ratings by PM on to ensure they are loaded for the meeting To help you prerate your employees the Corporate distribution is as follows Superior Excellent Strong Satisfactory Needs ImprovementIssues Business units are expected to meet these targets or do their best to meet these targets However no rankings will be forced Please keep this distribution handy when prerating employees If you need any help please feel free to call me Thanks

Re Associates PRC Year end ReviewRuss will be representing Michael Ratner at the PRC on and I am looking into the preranking meeting that is supposedly going on now However the Associate Analyst program indicated that this was a preranking for Associates within EBS Please provide your feedback to Mark before the PRC on and Rod Hayslett AM To Gretchen nron Gary P NRON cc Subject Re Associates PRC Year end Review what is she talking about Forwarded by Rod HayslettFGTEnron on AM Wilma NRON COMMUNICATIONS AM To Rod NRON cc Subject Re Associates PRC Year end Review Rod The PRC process closed last week You should have received information regarding representing your associatesanalysts at a meeting to be held on the th of this month If not you should check with the AssociateAnalysts or HR for this information After the preranking meeting then you should submit the ranking and your evaluation to Mark for the final Corporate ranking Thanks Wilma J Williams Enron Broadband Services Corporate Development PH EB Rod NRON AM To Wilma WilliamsEnron NRON COMMUNICATIONS cc Subject Re Associates PRC Year end Review When is the PRC Wilma NRON COMMUNICATIONS PM To Bryan KiteEnron nron Communications Brian SpectorEnron nron Communications Kal CT Richard ES Edward D CT Kim GodfreyEnron nron Communications Scott CT Rod nron Frank BayEnron nron Communications cc Subject Associates PRC Year end Review Dear Managers Mark J Russ has been selected for the yearend review to represent an associates under your management In order to do this effectively it is important that he receive your feedback and ranking as soon as possible If you have any questions please feel free to call Mark at or myself at Thank you in advance for your help Wilma J Williams Enron Broadband Services Corporate Development PH EB
